auctionReward.description: Reward provided by winning an auction.

reward.description: The total reward each player has accumulated from the auctions across all steps.

agentIndex.description: The index of the current agent.

penultimateBidderIndex.description: The index of the second-last agent who bid. This is not passed to agents.

ultimateBidderIndex.description: The index of the last agent who bid. This is not passed to agents.

action.description: Whether this agent wants to bid on this auction.
